data.title: The Impact of Applying Sustainability Accounting on the Market Value of Insurance Companies Listed on the Amman Stock Exchange
data.meta_description: The purpose of this study is to identify the impact of sustainability accounting (SA) with its three dimensions (social, economic, and environmental) on the market value (MV) of insurance companies listed on the Amman Stock Exchange (ICLASE). Accordingly, the...
